channel.title: Research on Hoang Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Hoang Nguyen

item.title: Added Worker Effect
item.description: This project documents empirical evidence of added worker effect (AWE) among US households using IPUMS Current Population Survey (CPS) microdata.

item.title: Wealth Inequality
item.description: This project replicates macroeconomic models featuring heterogeneous agents and wealth inequality.

item.title: College Financial Aid
item.description: This project analyzes college financial aid policies.
